title: Cash Shop Update for July 26
content: Legend of the Blue Sea Package, White Sand Beach Package, Sunset Beach Package, and more!

title: Miracle Summer - July 29 - Gloves
content: This Saturday, July 29, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Gloves!

title: [Updated] Investigation on NA Reboot Server Issues - July 20, 2023
content: We're currently investigating the rollback that occurred during the server issues on July 20, 2023.
